verbose_text: In addition, The Janus kinase / signal transducer and activator of transcription (JAK / STAT) pathway is participate in I/R induced intestinal injury; and ischemic postconditioning relieves the II/R injury through inhibiting JAK / STAT pathway XREF_BIBR.
evidence: transcription (JAK/STAT) pathway is participate in I/R-induced intestinal injury
